alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 9:36PM MDT until July 03 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Campbell County in northeastern Wyoming... Northwestern Weston County in northeastern Wyoming... Southwestern Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 1030 PM MDT. * At 935 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Rozet, or 14 miles northeast of Gillette, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rozet around 945 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Moorcroft, Keyhole Reservoir, Pine Haven and Upton. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 141 and 175. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
